body:
So far in the tournament, there have been a lot of great games. But it who will win make it passed the group stages? So far these are the standings and final group stages match ups!

Group A

-Impact (2-0) vs. Insidia (2-0)
-Peruan Combo (0-2, DQ)vs. Emancipators (0-2, DQ)

*Impact has seized a spot in the Single Elimination!
*Insidia has seized a spot in the Single Elimination!
*Peruan Combo has been DQ'ed
*Emancipators has been DQ'ed

Group B:

-Apollo (2-0) vs. Cacalmarin (1-1-0)
-Fortissimuss (0-1-1) vs Coffee (0-2, DQ)

*Apollo has siezed a spot in the Single Elimination!
*Cacalmarin advances with a win or tie
*Fortissimus advances with a 0-2 loss from Cacalmarin
*Coffe has been DQ'ed

Group C:

-PureBlox (1-1) vs. Citsitua (1-1)
-Bad Company (2-0) vs. FaZe (0-2, DQ'ed)

*Bad Company has siezed a spot in the Single Elimination (C1)!
*PureBlox advances with a win or tie
*Citsitua advances with a win
*FaZe has been DQ'ed

Group D:

-TheCrazyBeaners (2-0) vs. Allah (0-2)
-Kyudo (1-1) vs. BerzerkV2 (1-1)

*TheCrazyBeaners has siezed a spot in the Single Elminination (D1)!
*Kyudo advances with a win or tie 
*BerzerkV2 advances with a win 
*Allah cannot advance (#NeverForget)

If I have made a mistake, please tell me. But prediction time. Who will we be seeing from each group in the Single Elimination?

title: Tournament Predictions!

replies.body:
Group A: Impact and Peruan Combo (only if Peruan Combo isn't DQ'd) 
Group B: Apollo and Cacalmarin 
Group C: Bad Company and PureBlox
Group D: TheCrazyBeaners and BerkzerV2

Group B: Apollo and Cacalmarin 
Group C: Bad Company and PureBlox
